question: Which Indian star wrestler won the Gold medal at the Ukrainian Wrestlers and Coaches Memorial tournament?
explanation:
India's ace wrestler Vinesh Phogat wont he gold medal at the Ukrainian Wrestlers and Coaches Memorial tournament.
Vinesh Phogat, the world number three wrestler defeated the 2017 world champion V Kaladzinskay to win the gold medal. She is the only Indian woman wrestler to have qualified for the Tokyo Olympic Games.
